Class CopyController

java.lang.Object
com.library.library_management.controllers.admin.CopyController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/copies") public class CopyController extends Object
Controller class for managing copies of books in the library management system.

The CopyController provides functionality for listing, adding, updating, and deleting copies of books. Each copy represents a physical or digital instance of a book along with its status (e.g., available, checked out, or reserved). This class interacts with the data layer through the CopyDAO and BookDAO to manage copy-related operations and to retrieve related book data.

Marked with the Controller annotation, this class is integrated into the Spring MVC framework and processes requests based on the /copies path.

  • Constructor Details

    • CopyController

      public CopyController(CopyDAO copyDAO, BookDAO bookDAO)
      Constructs a new CopyController with the specified DAOs for copies and books.
      Parameters:
      copyDAO - the DAO used for copy-related operations
      bookDAO - the DAO used for book-related operations

  • Method Details

    • showCopies

      @GetMapping public String showCopies(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles HTTP GET requests to display the list of all copies.

      Fetches a list of copies from the data layer using CopyDAO.getAll() and populates the model with the retrieved Copy objects. The returned view renders the list of copies in the admin interface.

      Parameters:
      model - the Model object used to pass attributes to the view
      Returns:
      the name of the view template for displaying copies

    • deleteCopy

      @PostMapping("/delete/{id}") public String deleteCopy(@PathVariable("id") int id)
      Handles HTTP POST requests to delete a copy by its ID.

      Deletes the specified copy from the data layer using CopyDAO.delete(int). Redirects to the /copies endpoint after successful deletion.

      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the copy to be deleted
      Returns:
      a redirect to the copies list view

    • showUpdateForm

      @GetMapping("/update/{id}") public String showUpdateForm(@PathVariable("id") int id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles HTTP GET requests to display the form for updating details of a copy.

      Fetches the copy by ID using CopyDAO.getById(int) and retrieves all available books and copy statuses. Populates the model with the data needed to render the update form.

      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the copy to update
      model - the Model object used to pass attributes to the view
      Returns:
      the name of the view template for updating a copy

    • updateCopy

      @PostMapping("/update") public String updateCopy(@ModelAttribute Copy copy)
      Handles HTTP POST requests to update a copy.

      Updates the specified copy in the data layer using CopyDAO.update(Copy). Redirects to the /copies endpoint after the update is complete.

      Parameters:
      copy - the updated Copy object to save
      Returns:
      a redirect to the copies list view

    • showAddForm

      @GetMapping("/add") public String showAddForm(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles HTTP GET requests to display the form for adding a new copy.

      Initializes a new Copy object and fetches the list of books and available copy statuses using BookDAO.getAll() and CopyStatus.values(). Populates the model with the data needed to render the add form.

      Parameters:
      model - the Model object used to pass attributes to the view
      Returns:
      the name of the view template for adding a new copy

    • addCopy

      @PostMapping("/add") public String addCopy(@ModelAttribute Copy copy)
      Handles HTTP POST requests to add a new copy.

      Inserts the new copy into the data layer using CopyDAO.insert(Copy). Redirects to the /copies endpoint after the copy has been added.

      Parameters:
      copy - the new Copy object to add
      Returns:
      a redirect to the copies list view
